name: starfruit
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a yellow tropical fruit with smooth skin and five pointed, curved parts, making a star shape when you cut through it: You can replace the starfruit with pineapple. Exotic fruits ranging from lychees to star fruits can be found in local stores.
ansonsaw/iStock/Getty Image Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesToss the fruit salad and decorate with carambolas and cherries.
